about_the_game:
Unique Maps
Each map has several puzzles that the players have to solve to get to the next maps. Per map there are about 3 or more puzzles, so pay attention and do not get confused otherwise the monsters will come and get you.

User interface
The game offers a clear and good looking interface which is very easy to use

Sounds
The game has ambient sounds that adapt to the maps. In addition, the player will hear his own footsteps that adapt to the ground, as well as the steps of monsters. There are also sounds for opening boxes, doors and much more, so that the user has a good sound experience.

content_descriptors.notes: In the game you can find blood traces on walls and floors, monsters chase you and jump scares can occur.

name: Survive The Backrooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5 7600K or Ryzen 5 3600
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or R9 290X
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-10600KF or Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or RX 590
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Survive The Backrooms is a multiplayer CO-OP horror story game. The game is about 4 strangers who all have a dream and are now trapped in the backrooms. They can free themselves by solving the riddles and escaping the monsters.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
